Micah 5:2 - Ruler from Bethlehem

ID
Source Verse
Summary

prophecy_id: 00001 source_verse: Micah 5:2 summary: A ruler will come from Bethlehem, prophesied to be the Messiah. type: Direct category: Birth fulfilled: Yes confidence_level: High related_evidence: [E0001]

Fulfillment

This prophecy is fulfilled in the birth of Jesus Christ in Bethlehem.

Historical Context

  • Micah 5:2 was written around 1200 BCE.
  • Bethlehem was a small town, significant in Messianic prophecy.

Related Evidence
